page.title: 09HOTEL OWNERS DAY SKEGNESS
page.content:
Mrs.Capes runs a small Skegness hotel. This is a typical day in the season.
{0630}rise..check lounge .dining room {0800}serve morning teas.. prepare main breakfasts.{0845}staff arrive.. clear kitchen{0900}serve breakfast until {0930 0950}clear dining room..finish washing up.{1015}have a cup of tea. {1030}cleaning dining room,hall lounge and bathrooms. prepare vegetables for evening meal.{1145} prepare lunches..{1230}serve lunches {1330}clear away lunches{1530}cook vegetable for evening meals{1700} evening staff arrive clean kichen. {1730}evening meals served.{1900} clear dining room,wash up.Prepare tables for breakfast.{2030}bar open. {2400}clear bar and tidy lounge. {0010}or later depending on number in bar,lights out and lock up.
